name: Lustful Sprays
description:
Wile away with skunkgirls in Lustful Sprays. The game of Pictures and certain. Let’s call it tricks. You won’t find anything else exactly like this. Pick a girl and see what trick she has waiting. Come have a scent-sual encounter with your choice of skunkgirls.

You can click trough Pictures of SkunkGirls. They Spray you.

The Control is Q, W, E, Mouse Button, and Esc
